characters: Driver of a black sedan, driver of a white sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. A black sedan is ahead, and a white sedan appears from the right side lane and overtakes the black sedan. The white sedan then stops abruptly, causing potential danger.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while following the black sedan. The white sedan overtakes from the right side and stops abruptly, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black sedan, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 2) Right: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, overtaking the black sedan and stopping abruptly.
